explanation: [0-0] A young man in a black suit with a red tie and a young woman in a white shirt are standing in a blue room, a red heart icon above their heads. The man is smiling with his eyes closed, the woman is smiling at the camera. There is a chandelier with several white spheres in the room.

[0-4] Then the man uses his right hand and the woman uses her left hand to make a heart shape with their hands together. They smile and twist their bodies, looking at each other and the camera from time to time.

[0-4] Then the man uses his right hand and the woman uses her left hand to make a heart shape with their hands together. They smile and twist their bodies, looking at each other and the camera from time to time.

[4-6] Then the heart shape of their hands slowly separates, and their smiles disappear. Then the man looks at the camera with a fierce look on his face, and the woman looks at the camera with a serious look on her face, her lips closed. The man's right hand and the woman's left hand separate, each maintaining a grasping gesture. At this point, the blue room turns into a red room. The red heart icon above their heads turns into a broken heart icon.
